mapper.insert: insert into sys_appointment (user_id, lab_id, experiment_name, purpose, book_time, time_slot_id, `type`, major_id, class_number, `time`, create_time, update_time, status) select #{data.userId}, #{data.labId}, #{data.experimentName}, #{data.purpose}, DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day), #{data.timeSlotId}, '0', #{data.majorId}, #{data.classNumber}, concat((select start_time from sys_time_slot where sys_time_slot.id = #{data.timeSlotId}), ' ~ ', (select end_time from sys_time_slot where sys_time_slot.id = #{data.timeSlotId})), now(), now(), '1' where exists( select * from sys_lab_schedule inner join sys_lab on sys_lab.id=sys_lab_schedule.lab_id where sys_lab_schedule.lab_id = #{data.labId} and sys_lab_schedule.weekday = (DAYOFWEEK(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day))) and status = "0") and not exists( select * from sys_appointment where book_time = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day) and time_slot_id = #{data.timeSlotId} and ((lab_id = #{data.labId} and `type` = '1') or user_id = #{data.userId})) and (select sys_lab.capacity from sys_lab where sys_lab.id=#{data.labId})> (select count(*) from sys_appointment where book_time = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day) and time_slot_id = #{data.timeSlotId} and lab_id = #{data.labId})

insert into sys_appointment ( user_id, lab_id, experiment_name, purpose, book_time, time_slot_id, `type`, major_id, class_number, `time`, create_time, update_time, status, grade ) select #{data.userId}, #{data.labId}, #{data.experimentName}, #{data.purpose}, DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day), #{data.timeSlotId}, '1', #{data.majorId}, #{data.classNumber}, concat((select start_time from sys_time_slot where sys_time_slot.id=#{data.timeSlotId}),' ~ ',(select end_time from sys_time_slot where sys_time_slot.id=#{data.timeSlotId})), now(), now(), '0', #{data.grade} where exists ( select * from sys_lab_schedule where sys_lab_schedule.lab_id = #{data.labId} and sys_lab_schedule.weekday =(DAYOFWEEK(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day)))) and not exists ( select * from sys_appointment where book_time = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day) and time_slot_id = #{data.timeSlotId} and user_id = #{data.userId}) and (select count(*) from sys_appointment where book_time = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day) and time_slot_id = #{data.timeSlotId} and lab_id = #{data.labId}) = 0 and exists(select * from sys_lab where id = #{data.labId} and status = "0") and not exists(select * from sys_appointment where sys_appointment.class_number = #{data.classNumber} and sys_appointment.major_id = #{data.majorId} and sys_appointment.grade = #{data.grade} and sys_appointment.book_time = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{data.offsetDay} day) and sys_appointment.time_slot_id = #{data.timeSlotId})
mapper.select: select sys_lab.id lab_id, name, capacity, location, `type`, (select count(*) from sys_appointment where sys_appointment.lab_id = sys_lab.id and sys_appointment.time_slot_id = #{timeSlotId} and sys_appointment.book_time = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{offsetDay} day)) cur from sys_lab where `type` like concat('%', #{type}, '%') and status = "0" and exists( select * from sys_lab_schedule where sys_lab_schedule.lab_id = sys_lab.id and sys_lab_schedule.weekday = (DAYOFWEEK(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{offsetDay} day)))) and not exists( select * from sys_appointment where book_time = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), interval #{offsetDay} day) and time_slot_id = #{timeSlotId} and (`type` = '1' or user_id = #{userId}) and lab_id = sys_lab.id)

select sa.id, su.username,su.real_name appointUsername, sl.name labName, sa.experiment_name, sa.purpose, sa.book_time, sts.start_time, sts.end_time, sa.time,sa.create_time, sa.status from sys_appointment sa left join sys_lab sl on sl.id = sa.lab_id left join sys_user su on su.id = sa.user_id left join sys_time_slot sts on sa.time_slot_id = sts.id where sa.type = '0'
and sa.lab_id = #{labId}
